description: Square array read by falling antidiagonals of central polynomial coefficients: largest coefficient in expansion of (1 + x + x^2 + ... + x^(n-1))^k = ((1-x^n)/(1-x))^k, i.e., the coefficient of x^floor(k*(n-1)/2) and of x^ceiling(k*(n-1)/2); also number of compositions of floor(k*(n+1)/2) into exactly k positive integers each no more than n.
